INTERSHOP IOM 4.4.0-SNAPSHOT Database Model   (revision b54e894dbf58afce0fd3e5ff6fcc765f1ebd532c)

Table oms.PlatformConfigDO

Selected configurations of the platform.

Columns 

References[1] Column Type Constraints[2] Default Comment
id smallint PK, UNIQUE, NOT_NULL  
maxSearchResultSize integer NOT_NULL Number of maximum search results a search is limited to for selected searches. 
aggregationCount integer Number of threads selected article aggregations should be processed with. 
lastConfigDate timestamp without time zone NOT_NULL Date when the last cache clear was requested on the configuration-cache.
This is mostly the last step after changing a configuration using Java.
This is primarily informational, but can be used for further processes. 
userSessionDuration integer NOT_NULL 60 The maximum user session duration in minutes. 
showMaxReturnQuantity boolean NOT_NULL false Used during return creation in OMT and switches the displayed default quantity for items to return.
If TRUE, the prepopulated quantity value equals the maximum item quantity. If FALSE, the prepopulated quantity value is zero. 

[1] Not all references are enforced by a foreign key where they could.
Such "missing" foreign keys are denoted with [[ ]].

[2] Constraints:
PK : the column is part of the primary key
UNIQUE: does don't cover unique constraints and indexes defined on more than one column.
